properties.description: Each parameter in this data flow is defined as 'start position', 'offset' as in '1,7'.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Field1 as string ('1,7'),
	Field2 as string ('8,8'),
	Field3 as string ('15,10'),
	Field4 as string ('25,11'),
	Field5 as string ('36,10'),
	Field6 as string ('46,12'),
	Field7 as string ('58,1')
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> fixedsource1
fixedsource1 derive(Field1 = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Field1,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Field1,',')[2])),
		Field2 = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Field2,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Field2,',')[2])),
		Field3 = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Field3,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Field3,',')[2])),
		Field4 = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Field4,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Field4,',')[2])),
		Field5 = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Field5,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Field5,',')[2])),
		Field6 = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Field6,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Field6,',')[2])),
		Field7 = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Field7,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Field7,',')[2])),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> MapFields
MapFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['mysinglefile.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
